pullRequest.title: Add runtimeOptimizedStages in QueryCompletedEvent
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds runtimeOptimizedStages field in QueryMetadata of the QueryCompletedEvent, so that the runtime optimization information can be processed and logged later acordingly.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

nodes.bodyText: Is this a copy of what's in TestEventListenerPlugin?  You should be able to use those classes directly, e.g. like TestCompletedEventWarnings (maybe worth extracting all these TestingEventListener things to a top level class since it's used across multiple test classes
